<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King a proclamation for reformation of great abuses in measures. England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I) James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
3 leaves.
By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : [1603]
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Imperfect: cropped and faded. "Giuen at his Maiesties Castle of Windsor the fift day of Iuly, 1603. in the first yeere of our Reigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland the sixe and thirtieth." Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
=======

3 leaves.
By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : [1603]
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Imperfect: cropped and faded. "Giuen at his Maiesties Castle of Windsor the fift day of Iuly, 1603. in the first yeere of our Reigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland the sixe and thirtieth." Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
the Kings most excellent Maiestie
Robert Barker
